#include<bits/stdc++.h>
typedef long long int ll;
char ttt[20][20];
using namespace std;
ll fuc(ll i,ll j,ll n)
{
	ll uc = 0;
	while(i>=1)
	{
		if(ttt[i-1][j]!='X')
			break;
		else
			uc++;
		i--;	
	}
	return uc;
}
ll fdc(ll i,ll j,ll n)
{
	ll dc = 0;
	while(i<n-1)
	{
		if(ttt[i+1][j]!='X')
			break;
		else
			dc++;
		i++;	
	}
	return dc;
}
ll frc(ll i,ll j,ll n)
{
	ll rc = 0;
	while(j<n-1)
	{
		if(ttt[i][j+1]!='X')
			break;
		else
			rc++;
		j++;	
	}
	return rc;
}
ll flc(ll i,ll j,ll n)
{
	ll lc = 0;
	while(j>=1)
	{
		if(ttt[i][j-1]!='X')
			break;
		else
			lc++;
		j--;	
	}
	return lc;
}
ll fpuc(ll i,ll j,ll n)
{
	ll puc = 0;
	while(j>=1&&i>=1)
	{
		if(ttt[i-1][j-1]!='X')
			break;
		else
			puc++;
		i--;
		j--;
	}
	return puc;
}
ll fsuc(ll i,ll j,ll n)
{
	ll suc = 0;
	while(i>=1&&j<n-1)
	{
		if(ttt[i-1][j+1]!='X')
			break;
		else
			suc++;
		i--;
		j++;
	}
	return suc;
}
ll fpdc(ll i,ll j,ll n)
{
	ll pdc = 0;
	while(i<n-1&&j<n-1)
	{
		if(ttt[i+1][j+1]!='X')
			break;
		else
			pdc++;
		i++;
		j++;
	}
	return pdc;
}
ll fsdc(ll i,ll j,ll n)
{
	ll sdc = 0;
	while(i<n-1&&j>=1)
	{
		if(ttt[i+1][j-1]!='X')
			break;
		else
			sdc++;
		i++;
		j--;
	}
	return sdc;
}

int main()
{
	ll n,t,l,uc,dc,lc,rc,puc,pdc,suc,sdc,flag,i,j;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n >> l;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<n;j++)
				cin >> ttt[i][j];
		}
		flag = 0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(ttt[i][j]!='.')
					continue;
				else
				{
					uc = fuc(i,j,n);
					dc = fdc(i,j,n);
					if(uc+dc>=l-1)
					{
						flag = 1;
						break;
					}
					rc = frc(i,j,n);
					lc = flc(i,j,n);
					if(rc+lc>=l-1)
					{
						flag = 1;
						break;
					}
					puc = fpuc(i,j,n);
					pdc = fpdc(i,j,n);
					if(puc+pdc>=l-1)
					{
						flag = 1;
						break;
					}
					suc = fsuc(i,j,n);
					sdc = fsdc(i,j,n);
					if(suc+sdc>=l-1)
					{
						flag = 1;
						break;
					}
				}
			}
			if(flag == 1)
				break;
		}
		if(flag == 1)
			cout << "YES\n";
		else
			cout << "NO\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
